root.input

Class InputJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob
        • root.input.InputJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CanopyJob, CreateSimilarityMatrixJob, FormatImageDictJob, FormatImagesJob, FormatPointsDictJob, FormatPointsJob, FormatVectorsJob, FormatWordDictJob, HierarchicalAffinityPropagationJob, ImagesJob, KMeansJob, LyrlBenchmarkJob, LyrlJob, LyrlVectorizationJob, PointsJob, RenameFilesJob, RenameFilesJob, RenameFilesJob, ReutersBenchmarkJob, ReutersJob, ReutersVectorizationJob, SimilarityMatrixConverterJob, VectorizationJob, VectorizationJob, VectorizationJob, VectorizationJob

    public abstract class InputJob
extends org.apache.mahout.common.AbstractJob

    This is an abstract interface describing drivers for running various MapReduce jobs on any given input dataset in this software framework.

    To run this program from the command line:
    $ bin/hadoop root.Driver directive options

    Include (at minimum) the following external libraries on the classpath:
    lib/run/*.jar
    lib/build/*.jar

    Since:
    2013.06.25
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly
